reliquified_ars_nouveau.can_not_set_spel: The applied spell must start with the 'Touch' form!
reliquified_ars_nouveau.has_low_level_re: The number of components in the applied spell exceeds the limit allowed by the emblem!
tooltip.relics.cloak_of_concealment.desc: A cloak woven from special mana-infused fabric, capable of concentrating nearby mana into a durable barrier impervious to any weapon.
tooltip.relics.cloak_of_concealment.abil: Absorbs all incoming damage by consuming %1$s mana per 1 point of damage. When the player's mana drops to a critical level where absorption becomes impossible, the ability goes on cooldown for %2$s seconds.
tooltip.relics.cloak_of_concealment.leve: +%1$s experience points for each instance of absorbing 1.5 or more damage using the %2$s ability.
tooltip.relics.flaming_bracer.descriptio: A part of the legendary flaming armor, capable of conjuring magical flames from a victim's body even without the rest of its set.
tooltip.relics.flaming_bracer.ability.py: When dealing melee damage to a burning target, there is a %1$s%% chance to release magical fire from it. If triggered successfully, the ability repeats, releasing an additional burst of magical fire and continuing until the chance fails. Maximum triggers: %2$s.
tooltip.relics.flaming_bracer.ability.re: Grants the player complete immunity to magical fire damage.
tooltip.relics.flaming_bracer.leveling_s: +%1$s experience points for each activation of the %2$s ability.
tooltip.relics.ring_of_the_spectral_walk: An unusual ring inlaid with special spectral diamonds, renowned for their ability to phase through any material.

When activated, turns nearby blocks into spectral ones, consuming %1$s mana per second. While inside spectral blocks, the player can move forward in the direction they are looking, ignoring gravity and fall damage. If the ability ends while the player is in an unsafe location, they will be teleported to the last safe spot encountered.
+%1$s experience points for each second of using the %2$s ability.
tooltip.relics.quantum_bubble.descriptio: A weightless device that envelops any object it touches.
tooltip.relics.quantum_bubble.ability.st: When an enemy projectile appears within a 2-block radius, an aura activates for up to %1$s seconds, halting and trapping all hostile projectiles in bubbles for %2$s seconds. Once the aura expires, the ability goes on cooldown for %3$s seconds.
tooltip.relics.quantum_bubble.leveling_s: +%1$s experience points for each projectile trapped in a bubble by the %2$s ability.
tooltip.relics.emblem_of_assault.descrip: An elegant brooch in the shape of a sword. By channeling the flow through itself, it concentrates it into its wielder’s weapon.
tooltip.relics.emblem_of_assault.ability: Automatically applies the linked spell to the attacked target, then goes on cooldown for %1$s seconds. To use this ability, a spell must be inscribed onto the item using the Scribe’s Table, consisting of no more than %2$s components and starting with the 'Touch' form.
tooltip.relics.emblem_of_assault.levelin: +%1$s experience points for each activation of the %2$s ability.
tooltip.relics.emblem_of_defense.descrip: An elegant brooch in the shape of a shield. By channeling the flow through itself, it envelops its wearer in a thin yet strong protective film.
tooltip.relics.emblem_of_defense.ability: Automatically applies the linked spell to an enemy attacking the player, then goes on cooldown for %1$s seconds. To use this ability, a spell must be inscribed onto the item using the Scribe’s Table, consisting of no more than %2$s components and starting with the 'Touch' form.
tooltip.relics.emblem_of_defense.levelin: +%1$s experience points for each activation of the %2$s ability.
tooltip.relics.mana_ring.description: A golden ring inlaid with a massive flowstone capable of absorbing and channeling immense amounts of mana.
tooltip.relics.mana_ring.ability.empower: Increases the player's maximum mana by %1$s points and its regeneration by %2$s points per second.
tooltip.relics.mana_ring.leveling_source: +%1$s experience points for every 20 mana spent on a spell.
tooltip.relics.ring_of_thrift.descriptio: At first glance, an ordinary golden ring with a few small pink gemstones. However, their arrangement is not random—they somehow manage to retain the wearer's outgoing mana, preserving and returning it.
tooltip.relics.ring_of_thrift.ability.th: When casting a spell, there is a %1$s%% chance that no mana will be consumed.
tooltip.relics.ring_of_thrift.leveling_s: +%1$s experience points for each activation of the %2$s ability.
tooltip.relics.archmage_glove.descriptio: The secret of great wizards who could cast hundreds of spells without feeling the slightest fatigue. Though, once the secret is revealed... Can they still be called wizards? More like illusionists...
tooltip.relics.archmage_glove.ability.mu: When casting a spell, there is a %1$s%% chance to cast it again. If the effect triggers, the spell is used again, continuing until the chance fails. Each repetition does not consume mana, but the total number of repetitions cannot exceed 5. Works only on pink-colored spells [255 25 180].
tooltip.relics.archmage_glove.leveling_s: +%1$s experience points for each activation of the %2$s ability.
